plot outline: Blade Babji is a Telugu comedy movie released on 24 October 2008 under the banner of Satya Movies. Its star cast included Allari Naresh, Sayali Bhagat, Venu Madhav, Srinivasa Reddy, Krishna Bhagavan, Dharmavarapu, Kondavalasa, Jaya Prakash Reddy, Melkote, Brahmanandam, Khayyum, Ruthika, Kausha, Hema & Apoorva.Blade Babji (Allari Naresh) is a pickpocket who takes up the mission of earning 4 crores
title: Blade Babji
plot: _Blade Babji_ (qv) is a Telugu comedy movie released on 24 October 2008 under the banner of Satya Movies. Its star cast included Allari Naresh, Sayali Bhagat, Venu Madhav, Srinivasa Reddy, Krishna Bhagavan, Dharmavarapu, Kondavalasa, Jaya Prakash Reddy, Melkote, Brahmanandam, Khayyum, Ruthika, Kausha, Hema & Apoorva._Blade Babji_ (qv) (Allari Naresh) is a pickpocket who takes up the mission of earning 4 crores
